text: Bozdar Wada (, ) is a town in Thari Mirwah in Sindh province of Pakistan. It is about 50 kilometers from the city of Khairpur, and 30 kilometers from the ancient Kot Diji fort. == References == == Other websites == *https://mapcarta.com/14710268 *http://hamariweb.com/directories/govt._boys_high_school_bozdar_wada,_mirwah_edu34499.aspx Category:Tehsils of Sindh Category:Towns in Sindh Category:Khairpur District
title: Bozdar Wada
